////							 						PLATFORMS 									  					////
// Parameters:                                                                              							  //
//                                                                         												  //
// [ID]int 						= The ID of the object.                                   								  //
// [NAME (LANG)]string 			= The name of the platform in the respective language.   								  //
// [MANUFACTURER (LANG)]		= The manufacturer of the platform. If [PUB] has an ID,                                   //
//								  the name of the [PUB] publisher must be entered as the manufacturer.                    //
// [DATE](MONTH) (YEAR) 		= The date when the platform is available.     											  //
// [DATE END](MONTH) (YEAR)		= The date when the platform will be removed from the market.                             //
//								  If this parameter is omitted, the platform will never be removed from the market.       //
// [PRICE]int					= How much the platform dev kit costs.                 									  //
// [DEV COSTS]int				= The development costs of the platform.       											  //
// [TECHLEVEL]int				= The tech level of the platform.                                                         //
// [UNITS]int					= Number of units sold.                                                                   //
// [PIC-1]string				= The filename of the image that will be used as the first picture.                       //
// [PIC-2]string				= The filename of the image that will be used as the second picture.                      //
// [PIC-2 YEAR](YEAR)			= The year when the image of [PIC-2] is used.                                             //
// [NEED-(1-2)](ID)				= The gameplay features that are needed.                                                  //
// [COMPLEX](0-2)				= The complexity of the platform.                                                         //
// [INTERNET](0-1)				= Is this platform internet capable?                                                      //
// [TYP]int						= The type of platform.                                                                   //
//									0 = Computer                                                                          //
//									1 = Stationary Console                                                                //
//									2 = Handheld                                                                          //
//									3 = Smartphone                                                                        //
//									4 = Arcade                                                                            //
// [STARTPLATFORM]				= Is available at the start of the game (1976).                                           //
// [PUB](ID)					= The publisher who owns this platform.                                                   //
// [GAMEPASS]int				= Minimum number of games required for Game Pass.                                         //
// [BACKCOMP-(1-4)](ID)			= The platform is backwards compatible with the specified platforms.                      //
// [PRE](ID)					= The specified platform is the predecessor of this platform.                             //
// [SUC](ID)					= The specified platform is the successor of this platform.                               //
// [END]						= Ends the entry.                                    									  //
//                                                                                    									  //
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

[ID]1
[NAME EN]Amiga 500
[NAME GE]Amiga 500
[NAME TU]Amiga 500
[NAME FR]Amiga 500
[NAME HU]Amiga 500
[NAME JA]Amiga 500
[NAME PL]Amiga 500
[NAME CH]Amiga 500
[NAME UA]Amiga 500
[NAME TH]Amiga 500

[MANUFACTURER FR]Commodore
[MANUFACTURER HU]Commodore
[MANUFACTURER JA]コンモドー
[MANUFACTURER PL]Commodore
[MANUFACTURER CH]Commodore
[MANUFACTURER UA]Commodore
[MANUFACTURER TH]Commodore
[DATE]APR 1987
[DATE END]APR 1992
[PRICE]30600
[DEV COSTS]10500
[TECHLEVEL]3
[UNITS]10000000

[NEED-1]44
[COMPLEX]0
[INTERNET]1
[TYP]0
[GAMEPASS]10
[BACKCOMP-1]2
[PRE]2
[SUC]-1
[END]
